scripts.build: yarn clean; yarn webpack --mode development --config webpack.config.js; cp css/* server/dist/; go build .
scripts.build-static: yarn clean-static && yarn webpack --mode development --env IS_STATIC=true --config webpack.config.js && cp -r server/index.html static/ && cp css/* static/dist/ && go build
scripts.release: yarn clean; yarn cleancss css/* -o server/dist/base.css; yarn webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js; gzip server/dist/*; go build .
scripts.release-static: yarn clean-static && yarn webpack --mode production --env IS_STATIC=true --config webpack.config.js && cp -r server/index.html static/ && yarn cleancss css/* -o static/dist/base.css
scripts.publish-static: yarn release-static && aws s3 sync static/ s3://code.stevearc.com/
